data.text: @EL44766671 @ChefSue50 @NC_Governor More like the thousands of unvaccinated illegal aliens pouring into the state and the country.

@NC_Governor Single mom here, me and my kids ALWAYS mask and social distance, stay home a lot- do virtual school. WE JUST CAUGHT COVID. We’re full vaxxed but couldn’t get boosted yet. I’m left with debilitating headaches since the diagnosis that started a few days b4 dx

@brettbum @NC_Governor I don’t think these are mistakes. I look at the scientific data, and there’s no way I know more than our leaders. These were well informed choices from the top down. I’m disgusted.
@brettbum @NC_Governor Bingo!!!!!! Absolutely!!!! I loved Cooper until then. You’re absolutely spot on.

@brettbum @NC_Governor I think most “leadership” has decided everyone is going to get it. They don’t care if the air is safe. I’ve watched the response from the top down. These people aren’t stupid or misinformed. This is purposeful.
@NC_Governor You spelled midterm elections wrong, you puppet
@ChefSue50 @NC_Governor could that be why new cases?
